Expense Settlement Application
  • Home
  • Dashboard
  • Welcome {{email}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserStoreService } from '../services/user-store.service'; import { UserServiceService } from '../services/user-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'], }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit { email!: string | null; constructor(private userStoreService: UserStoreService,private useService:UserServiceService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.userStoreService.getEmailFromStore().subscribe((data)=>{ this.email=data || this.userStoreService.getEmailFromStore(); }) } }
